name: Daniel R. MILLER Jr., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Miller v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the per curiam order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

959 A.2d 297
